content: So whomever comes along can literally censor speech he/she doesn’t like? Unless EVERYONE has free speech, no one does! There’s no “right” to never feel offended by words. “Hate” speech which is checked in all venues, is that which incites violence against one or more others; and yet it’s allowed from 1 side of the spectrum freely, while banned on the other, or at best impeded! WHO becomes the arbiter of what is or isn’t acceptable speech? ONLY God Himself has that right; and He’s not sitting at a computer scanning e-mails, blogs, etc. Either laws are applied EQUALLY to all or there is no law and order for any.
